original_text: This shows that you are fools. You do not understand what is true. Think about which of these is more important. Is it the gold things in the temple? Or is it the temple itself? It is the temple that makes the gold things special.
korean_text: 어리석은 맹인들이여 어느 것이 크냐 그 금이냐 그 금을 거룩하게 하는 성전이냐

sentences.original_text: This shows that you are fools.
You do not understand what is true.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 무엇이 참된 것인지 이해하지 못한다.

sentences.original_text: Think about which of these is more important.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들 중 어느 것이 더 중요한지 생각해보아라.

sentences.original_text: Is it the gold things in the temple?
Or is it the temple itself?
It is the temple that makes the gold things special.
